teng2
HSK 3: 疼
HSK 6: 腾,騰
Freq: 8829
Hanzi: 䲢
䲢，俗名敏鱼，鮸鱼，为辐鳍鱼纲鲈形目石首鱼科鰧属的其中一个种。又称网纹鰧，潮汕俗名：铜锣锤，铜锣乖。英文称之为“望星者”（Stargazers）。常钻在海底的沙或泥土中，只露出口部和头部，等待食物接近。当有食物接近时，口中便会吐出丝状物质，粘住后便趁机捉住并吞入口中。
The common name is sacred fish, scorpionfish, which is one of the species of the genus genus of the sclerotidae of the class Perciformes. Also known as reticulated 鰧, Chaoshan common name: Tongluo hammer, Tongluo good. It is called "Stargazers" in English. Often drilled in the sand or mud on the bottom of the sea, only the mouth and head are exposed, waiting for food to approach. When food is approaching, the mouth will spit out a filamentous substance, and after it is stuck, it will take the opportunity to catch and swallow it in the mouth.

鰧字的基本解释

鰧
téng
〔鰧鱼〕体呈长锥形，头宽大而平扁，口大，下颔突出，栖息在浅海底层。
古代传说中的一种鱼：“（半石之山）合水出于其阴，……多鰧鱼，状如鳜，居逵，苍文赤尾。”

鰧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［téng］
［《廣韻》徒登切，平登，定。］
［《廣韻》直稔切，上寢，澄。］
鱼名。体黄褐色，头大而阔，眼小，下颌突出，有两个背鳍。常栖息在海底，捕食小鱼。

鰧字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鰧； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1476第05
【廣韻】【集韻】?徒登切，音騰。魚名。蒼身赤尾。【山海經】合水多鰧魚。狀如鱖，居逵。【類篇】或作?。又【廣韻】【集韻】?直稔切，音朕。魚似鰕赤文。

鰧字的源字形

鰧
Basic explanation of words
鰧
téng
〔鰧鱼〕 has a long cone-shaped body, a broad and flat head, a large mouth, and a protruding jaw. It lives on the shallow seabed.
A kind of fish in ancient legend: "(The mountain of half-stone) merges with water and comes from its shade,...multiple fish, resembling a mandarin fish, living in a loquat, Cangwen red tail."
鰧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［téng］
["Guangyun" Tu Dengqi, Ping Deng, Ding. ]
["Guangyun" cut straight, go to bed, clear. ]
The name of the fish. The body is yellowish brown, the head is large and broad, the eyes are small, the lower jaw is prominent, and it has two dorsal fins. They often live on the bottom of the sea and prey on small fish.
鰧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鰧; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1476 05
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Tu Dengqie, Yin Teng. The name of the fish. Cang body and naked tail. [Shan Hai Jing] Heshui and more gypsy fish. Shaped like a mandarin fish, living in Kui. 【Classes】Or for?. And [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Direct Minor cut, Yin Zhen. The fish is like a red text.
